column5: We have a brand new spacious house with 3 bedrooms with 3 Full bath just waiting for you.  You are going to book a 1 Bedroom with 1 Queen Bed and a full bath. All rooms have its separate private restroom with shower and bath. All the three rooms are located upstairs. Our Rates per night are very affordable. We encourage our guests to send us a message introducing yourself and your companion and your plans during your stay.
column8: Affordable, Safe, Quiet Room with full bath R3
